constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 104 (Friday, June 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 8142.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII, Clause 14: ``Congress shall have
the power to . . . make rules for the government and
regulation of the land and naval forces . . .''
[Page H5685]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: Department of Defense Law Enforcement Credential Act of 2022
